name: MEC Hideaway Sun Hat - Women's
description:
Functional and practical, pull on this sun hat for coverage in the summer heat. The wide brim gives you ample shading and is foam stiffened to keep it afloat in case of an unexpected dip.Woven nylon has UPF 50+ and a rain-shedding DWR finish.Mesh lining and embroidered eyelets vent heat.Soft polyester sweatband.Foam-stiffened brim floats holds its shape.Adjustable shockcord in headband.Removable chin cord with cord lock.

        Sustainability
